page.title: 12Tourism in Bexhill
page.content: Bexhill has a lot to offer tourists. There is good entertainment, transport to big places like London and good hotels on the seafront. For {entertainment}there is the De La Warr Pavilion, the Curzon{cinema}and lots of{sports.}There are lovely sandy {beaches}at low tide. There are cabins for hire and an unspoilt promenade of one and a half miles. Bexhill is a sunny{seaside resort}with over 8 hours {sunshine}a day in summer. There are activities for when it rains such as the large{library.}Bexhill has a {station}which has good access to London, Eastbourne and Brighton. There is easy access to Battle, Rye and Winchelsea which have all got other tourist attractions. The{hotels}are good, two four star and many three star hotels and many listed guest houses.
